thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-United States Steel To Restart Granite City Works Blast Furnace, Steelmaking Facilities

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-United States Steel To Restart Granite City Works Blast Furnace, Steelmaking Facilities
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - United States Steel Corp:
* UNITED STATES STEEL TO RESTART GRANITE CITY WORKS BLAST FURNACE, STEELMAKING FACILITIES
* UNITED STATES STEEL - WILL RESTART ONE OF TWO BLAST FURNACES AND STEELMAKING FACILITIES AT ITS GRANITE CITY WORKS PLANT
* UNITED STATES STEEL - ANTICIPATES CALLING BACK ABOUT 500 EMPLOYEES BEGINNING THIS MONTH RELATED TO RESTART OF FACILITIES
* UNITED STATES STEEL CORP - ‍RESTART PROCESS COULD TAKE UP TO FOUR MONTHS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
